description.value:
You manipulate the target's genetic code and accelerate the inevitable, pressuring the target to undergo carcinization and become a crab. A willing target fully transforms into a crab, as if it had cast animal form heightened to the same rank as this spell and using the following statistics.

  • Crab

    • Speed 25 feet, swim 15 feet
    • Melee 1 big claw, Damage 2d8 piercing
    • Melee 1 claw (agile), Damage 2d4 piercing.
    • Can breathe air and water.

@UUID[Compendium.sf2e-anachronism.spell-effects.Item.16Li37zRYKClxqsv]{Spell Effect: Carcinization}

Unwilling targets must instead attempt a Fortitude save.

Critical Success The target is unaffected.

Success The target's body gains minor features of a crab, its appendages turning into claws and causing it to become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Clumsy 1}.

Failure The target transforms into a partial crab-like being, becoming clumsy 1, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Stupefied 1}, and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened 1}.

Critical Failure The target is transformed into a partial crab-like being and becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Clumsy 2}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Stupefied 2}, and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened 2}.
